base_description: Gray, L-shaped object with a flat base.
part_description: Consists of a flat rectangular base, cylindrical vertical section, and an L-shaped arm. The cylindrical section is attached to one side of the base, and the arm extends horizontally from the top of the cylinder.
internal_interaction_description: The cylindrical section supports the L-shaped arm, providing stability and allowing it to maintain an upright position. The arm is securely attached to the cylinder, ensuring it remains fixed during use. The base provides a stable platform, distributing weight evenly to prevent tipping.
external_interaction_description: The object can be positioned on flat surfaces and may interact with other objects by supporting or holding them. It can be manually adjusted or moved by people, providing utility in various contexts such as holding or supporting items in place.
